2. Micah Fenton

Micah Fenton
============

![Micah Fenton](https://www.marshalltexas.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3141)



Micah Fenton, District 7
------------------------

: 2022 to 2026
[Email Micah Fenton](mailto:fenton.micah@marshalltexas.net)

Micah Fenton is a native of Marshall and graduated from Marshall High School in 1998.  He attended Panola Junior College, Blinn Junior College, and East Texas Baptist University.  He is married to Indy Roth Fenton and they are the proud parents of Ben, Miles, and Liam.

Council Member Fenton has served as the COO at Davis Chemical Services since 2012.  He has extensive knowledge in the oil industry with a career that spans over 20 years.

* [City Council](https://www.marshalltexas.net/220/City-Council)




![Marshall Texas Homepage](https://www.marshalltexas.net/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=2991)
